data.name: Hard hitter (Easy)
data.description: Hit an idol for at least 10 damage in one hit against Easy AI

data.name: Smashing (Easy)
data.description: Win a game by destroying all five of your opponents idols against Easy AI

data.name: Bunnytastic (Easy)
data.description: Have at least six bunnies on your side of the board during a match against Easy AI

data.name: Friendly
data.description: Typed GLHF into the chat on your first turn (or 'GL HF', 'GL, HF', 'GL & HF', any of those followed by other text)

data.name: Good sport
data.description: Typed GG into chat after a defeat (optionally followed by other text)

data.name: Sit back and relax
data.description: Spectated a live game

data.name: Notable
data.description: Have 5 users spectate one of your matches

data.name: Purity
data.description: Win a game with a single resource deck

data.name: Diversity
data.description: Win a game using a multi-resource deck

data.name: Resourceful
data.description: Reach 10  of the same resource in a game

data.name: Conservative
data.description: Win a match without exceeding 5 resource count

data.name: Quick win
data.description: Win a multiplayer match in less than 20 turns

data.name: Quick thinker (Easy)
data.description: Win a match against Easy AI without spending longer than 10 seconds on each of your turns

data.name: Don't call it a comeback
data.description: Lose two idols, then come back to win a game

data.name: Hard hitter (Hard)
data.description: Hit an idol for at least 10 damage in one hit against Hard AI

data.name: Hard hitter (MP)
data.description: Hit an idol for at least 10 damage in one hit in a muliplayer quick or ranked match

data.name: Smashing (Hard)
data.description: Win a game by destroying all five of your opponents idols against Hard AI

data.name: Smashing (MP)
data.description: Win a game by destroying all five of your opponents idols in a muliplayer quick or ranked match

data.name: Bunnytastic (Hard)
data.description: Have at least six bunnies on your side of the board during a match against Hard AI

data.name: Bunnytastic (MP)
data.description: Have at least six bunnies on your side of the board during a muliplayer quick or ranked match

data.name: Renowned
data.description: Have ten users spectate one of your matches

data.name: Celebrity
data.description: Have twenty users spectate one of your matches

data.name: Gluttonous
data.description: Reach 15 of the same resource in a game

data.name: Just plain greedy
data.description: Reach 20 of the same resource in a game

data.name: Stampede
data.description: Win a multiplayer match in less than 15 turns

data.name: Blazingly fast
data.description: Win a multiplayer match in less than 10 turns

data.name: Quick thinker (Hard)
data.description: Win a match against Hard AI without spending longer than 10 seconds on each of your turns
